-- create master key
go

create database scoped credential wplushiramsynapsefs_cred
with 
     identity = 'wplushiramsynapseadlsv2', 
     secret = '' --my storage key, sas not needed
go 

-- if behind private endpoint, in order to auth FW need to use Service Idendity. Using the key wont work.

create database scoped credential msi_cred
with 
     identity = 'Managed Identity' -- same as 'Managed Service Identity'
go 

drop external data source wplushiramsynapsefs
go 

create external data source wplushiramsynapsefs
with (    
    location = 'wasbs://wplushiramsynapsefs@wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.blob.core.windows.net/',
    credential = msi_cred,
    type = HADOOP
)
-- wasbs recommened for big data workloads & adls gen2.
-- https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/storage/blobs/data-lake-storage-introduction#key-features-of-data-lake-storage-gen2

-- url https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/wplushiramsynapsefs
-- endpoint https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/

drop external file format skipHeader_CSV
go 

create external file format skipHeader_CSV
with (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS(
          FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
          STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
          FIRST_ROW = 2, 
          USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = True)
)

if object_id('extDevs') is not null drop external table extDevs
go 

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE extDevs (
    [first] varchar(50),
    [last] varchar(50)
)  
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'devs.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = wplushiramsynapsefs,  
    FILE_FORMAT = skipHeader_CSV
)
GO

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM extDevs
